Interface InputMedia

All Superinterfaces:
Serializable
All Known Subinterfaces:
InputPaidMedia
All Known Implementing Classes:
InputMediaAnimation, InputMediaAudio, InputMediaBuilder, InputMediaDocument, InputMediaPhoto, InputMediaVideo, InputPaidMediaPhoto, InputPaidMediaVideo, InputSticker
public interface InputMedia extends Serializable
This object represents the content of a media message to be sent.
